title: Understanding Cell Protection
text: Cell protection is a feature in spreadsheet software that helps maintain the integrity of your data. It prevents accidental changes to important cells.

title: Why Use Cell Protection?
text: Consider scenarios where you have critical formulas or data that should not be altered. Cell protection ensures these remain unchanged.

hintAnswer: ensures that users do not inadvertently change values that are critical to the worksheet
title: Identifying the Correct Function of Cell Protection
text: Which of the following best describes the function of cell protection?
choices: ensures that users do not inadvertently change values that are critical to the worksheet
ensures that cell formatting does not change
ensures that values do not change the formatting
